translation.text:
Delays continue to services following a track maintenance vehicle with a mechanical issue at Circular Quay earlier.

All efforts are being made to provide a frequent service however, service gaps may be experienced at some stations as a result.

Buses may supplement some train services to assist customers reach their destinations.

Please allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements and check information screens for individual service updates.

Delays continue to services following a track maintenance vehicle with a mechanical issue at Circular Quay earlier.

All efforts are being made to provide a frequent service however, service gaps may be experienced at some stations as a result.

Buses may supplement some train services to assist customers reach their destinations.

Please allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements and check information screens for individual service updates.

Delays continue to services following a track maintenance vehicle with a mechanical issue at Circular Quay earlier.

All efforts are being made to provide a frequent service however, service gaps may be experienced at some stations as a result.

Buses may supplement some train services to assist customers reach their destinations.

Please allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements and check information screens for individual service updates.

A reduced service due to a track maintenance vehicle with a mechanical issue at Circular Quay earlier. Trains will run every 20 minutes instead of every 10 minutes. Please allow additional travel time. 
At this stage, there is no forecast of when the services will return to normal. Further updates will be provided as information becomes available.

This service will now stop Central, Redfern Erskineville, St Peters, Sydenham, Tempe, Revesby then all stations to Macarthur due to a track maintenance vehicle with mechanical issues at Circular Quay earlier.
Harris Park, Clyde, Auburn, Flemington, Homebush due to a mechanical issue with a track maintenance vehicle at Circular Quay earlier. Please allow plenty of extra travel time.

due to train requiring mechanical repairs at Cowan earlier. This service has been further delayed due to an operational issue at Central. Please allow up to 25 minutes additional travel time.

The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 and 2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9848 9151.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9563 7992.
The lift between the concourse and street level is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or call 4223 5864.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9851 7243.

Buses may supplement some trains between Campbelltown & Macarthur due to a track maintenance vehicle with a mechanical issue at Circular Quay earlier. Local bus routes are also an alternative option.

Please allow additional travel time.
Station Update - Edmondson Park, Glenfield, Leppington

Buses may supplement some trains between Glenfield & Leppington following a track maintenance vehicle with a mechanical issue at Circular Quay earlier. Local bus routes are also an alternative option.

Please allow additional travel time.

From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 to 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 to 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959

The Katoomba Station carpark on Goldsmith Place will operate to a reduced capacity from Thursday 25 February to Monday 1 March due to infrastructure upgrade works. Please consider driving to another station to park your car.
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Platforms 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works. A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
